title: We Are
description: Mizuki is a elementary school student who aiming to be an artist, altough his parent didn't allow him to.Akira is a girly-looking boy who is really an introvert and has trauma for a bad experience he had that brought him to meet Mizuki.Together, they're helping each other to make their dreams come true.Also contains the manga "Love Letter"Hajime-chan ga Ichiban! (Sequel)
author: Taeko Watanabe
